Text.val: Ginanjar -- Blok if else ditambahkan jika ada cancel, soalnya sebelumnya selalu call Reverse Jurnal

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans(' === Variable Pharsing To Journal === => ObjType : '&Trim({1,1})&' => vBplId : '&IF(ISNULL({292,8}),'Kosong', Str({292,8}, '10'))&' => vYear : '&IF(ISNULL({292,12}),'Kosong', Str({292,12}, '4'))&' => vPeriod : '&IF(ISNULL({292,13}),'Kosong', Str({292,13}, '2'))&' => DocDate : '&IF(ISNULL({292,4}),'Kosong', DStr({292,4}, {32768,36}))&' => pDocEntry : '&IF(ISNULL({1,3}),'Kosong', Str({1,3}, '10'))&' ')

MlsTrans(' === Variable Pharsing To Journal [TP] === => ObjType : '&Trim({1,1})&' => vBplId : '&IF(ISNULL({292,8}),'Kosong', Str({292,8}, '10'))&' => vYear : '&IF(ISNULL({292,12}),'Kosong', Str({292,12}, '4'))&' => vPeriod : '&IF(ISNULL({292,13}),'Kosong', Str({292,13}, '2'))&' => DocDate : '&IF(ISNULL({292,4}),'Kosong', DStr({292,4}, {32768,36}))&' => pDocEntry : '&IF(ISNULL({1,3}),'Kosong', Str({1,3}, '10'))&' ')
